input.sentences: we went to the evolution museum to look at the statues .
we found this smaller nugget of a brain .
we also found some interesting facial masks .
they got much closer to human appearance .
the very final mask was the most creepy .
output.sentences: Afterwards some went to a museum and saw a interesting statue.
Later, they saw a x-ray representation of the human head, showcasing the brain.
They even ran over some rather... peculiar masks.
Some creepy, some just out of ordinary and unexpected.
